name.ja: <ruby>Ｋ９<rt>ケーナイン</rt></ruby>－ＥＸ “<ruby>Ｒｉｐｐｅｒ<rt>リッパー</rt></ruby>／<ruby>Ｍ<rt>ミレニア</rt></ruby>”

text.en:
2 Level 9 monsters
If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. You can only use each of the following effects of "K9-X "Ripper/Millennia"" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned by a "K9" Spell/Trap effect: You can target up to 2 cards in your opponent's GY and/or banishment; shuffle them into the Deck. When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can detach 2 materials from this card; negate that effect, then destroy all cards on the field.
